summary: Completed comprehensive Fractal V2.1 frontend dashboard testing. All core features working perfectly - Signal Card shows BTC/HOLD/Confidence/Expected Return, horizon toggle (7d/14d/30d) functional, Forecast Chart with Canvas rendering and cubic hermite interpolation, Reliability panel with DEGRADED badge, Entropy Guard with consensus strength, Pattern Matches panel with 3 historical matches, and navigation working between Home and Fractal pages.

minor_issues.issue: Health endpoint returns 404 - different route structure than expected
minor_issues.impact: No impact on main functionality - fractal signal API working perfectly

working_endpoints.note: All required fields present (meta, signalsByHorizon with 7d/14d/30d, assembled, reliability, risk, explain)

minor_console_warnings.issue: 404 errors in console for '/api/' endpoint from Home page health check
minor_console_warnings.impact: Cosmetic only - main fractal API working correctly

passed_tests: /fractal page loads successfully with all components
Signal Summary Card displays BTC symbol, HOLD action, Confidence (1.24%), Expected Return (+10.73%)
Horizon toggle buttons (7d/14d/30d) all clickable and functional
Forecast Chart canvas renders with forecast curve and confidence band
Chart hover interaction shows tooltips with day/return values
Reliability panel shows DEGRADED badge (47.10%) with component breakdowns
Entropy Guard displays Consensus Strength (1.69%) and Size Multiplier (15.00%)
Pattern Matches panel displays 3 historical matches with similarity/stability metrics
Why Not Trading section shows system reliability degraded and confidence below threshold
Navigation between Home and Fractal Analysis working perfectly
Footer displays 'Fractal V2.1 • Contract Frozen • Horizons: 7d / 14d / 30d'
